title: Comments on quasicrystalline phases and examples of quasicrystalline phase nomenclature inNomenclature of magnetic, incommensurate, composition-changed morphotropic, polytype, transient-structural and quasicrystalline phases undergoing phase transitions. II. Report of an IUCr Working Group on Phase Transition Nomenclatureby J.-C. Tolédanoet al.(2001).Acta Cryst. A57, 614–626
